ygData.subject: Re: Glad the list is alive!
ygData.msgSnippet: Evidently AOL has problems with MIME-encoded docs.  The trumpet player from my band has a hard time getting attachments that come to me fine (using Microstuff
ygData.messageBody:
Evidently AOL has problems with MIME-encoded docs. The trumpet player from
my band has a hard time getting attachments that come to me fine (using
Microstuff Outlook or Outlook Express).

If anyone knows how to deal with this let me know - so I can pass it along

Thanks

Dan Sniderman
aka Slyde of Xegony
----- Original Message -----
From: <Elminstr95@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 5:03 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Glad the list is alive!


> From: Elminstr95@...
>
> I can't look at the maps..when i try to open them it says soemthing about
my

> anyone tell me how to fix it? E-mail me at Elminstr95@.... Thanks.
